title: Kendra Wilkinson beams as she steps out with billionaire boyfriend
text:
They've been dating at least since August.

And Kendra Wilkinson and Donald DJ Friese were spotted in public together for the first time on Thursday night as they left Tao Restaurant in Hollywood after a romantic dinner.

The Kendra On Top star, 34, wore a white silk blouse paired with skintight leather pants with a high waist.

Out: Kendra Wilkinson and Donald DJ Friese were spotted in public together for the first time on Thursday night as they left Tao Restaurant in Hollywood after a romantic dinner

She accessorized with a studded beige crossbody handbag as well as a pair of brown boots.

Her beau kept it simple with a long-sleeved shirt that clung to his chiseled frame and a pair of dark wash straight leg jeans.

A source via E! News said the two had been friends for 'a very long time' before reconnecting after Friese parted ways with his ex-girlfriend, Baywatch star Donna D'Errico. He has also been linked to Brandi Glanville and Melissa Meeks.

Happy: The Kendra on Top star, 34, wore a white silk blouse paired with skintight leather pants with a high waist

'They grabbed dinner a few times and really enjoyed each other's company. They are definitely dating and talking every day, but it's not serious,' the source said at the end of August.

The source continued that Wilkinson and Friese have 'seen each other multiple times' but are choosing to keep their relationship low-key.

'They both have agreed that if nothing ends up progressing between the two, that they would always remain friends,' the source continued.

Stylish: She accessorized with a studded beige crossbody handbag as well as a pair of brown boots

Friese is a billionaire businessman and CEO plus former owner of C.R. Laurence, a glazing supplies company.

Wilkinson's romantic date comes around seven months following the finalization of her divorce from Hank Baskett.

The couple split in April 2018 and have made their kids Hank Baskett IV and Alijah Mary Baskett a priority.

The former Playboy cover girl was adamant about letting her fans realize her focus on family, posting the following message to her Instagram Story: 'I have no time or energy to date anyone. I'm focusing on my kids and myself. Rest. Health. Work.'

Wilkinson and Baskett were wed in 2009.
